effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

description.en: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
